profileManager.addProfileDescription: Enter a name for your new profile.
profileManager.deleteProfileDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the profile '{profileName}' and all its associated data.

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyNote: Your key is stored securely in your browser.

dataTabs.title: Data Manager
dataTabs.description: Add, view, and manage your financial data.
dataTabs.name: Name
dataTabs.editDescription: Edit the details of your entry below.

calendar.title: Payment Calendar
calendar.noPayments: No payments due on this day.
calendar.selectDayHint: Select a day to see payments.

expenseChart.title: Monthly Expense Breakdown
expenseChart.description: A breakdown of your monthly spending.

incomeChart.title: Monthly Income Breakdown
incomeChart.description: A breakdown of your monthly income sources.

cashflowChart.title: Monthly Cash Flow Trend
cashflowChart.description: A comparison of your income and expenses over the last 12 months.

savingsGoals.title: Savings Goals
savingsGoals.description: Create and track your financial goals.
savingsGoals.noGoals: You haven't set any savings goals yet.
savingsGoals.addGoalDescription: Give your goal a name and a target amount.
savingsGoals.editGoalDescription: Adjust the details of your savings goal.
savingsGoals.addFundsDescription: How much would you like to add to "{{goalName}}"?

savingsAccounts.title: Savings & Assets
savingsAccounts.description: Manage your savings accounts and cash assets.
savingsAccounts.noAccounts: You haven't added any accounts yet.
savingsAccounts.addAccountDescription: Add a savings account or cash holdings.
savingsAccounts.editAccountDescription: Adjust the details of your account.

about.title: About This App
about.author: Created by Mohamed Haji
about.description: This application was developed by Mohamed Haji, a Full-Stack Software Developer, using Firebase Studio based on his ideas and design concepts.
about.noteContent: This app is experimental and intended for demonstration purposes. All data is stored locally in your browser.

toasts.importSuccessDescription: All profiles have been imported successfully.
toasts.importFailedDescription: Could not process file. Please check the format.
toasts.profileInvalid: Profile name is invalid or already exists.
toasts.profileDeleteError: The default profile or the only existing profile cannot be deleted.
toasts.generatingReportDescription: Please wait a moment while the data is being gathered.

validation.source: Source must be at least 2 characters.
validation.category: Category must be at least 2 characters.
validation.name: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.numberOfPayments: Must be a positive number of payments.
validation.goalName: Goal name must be at least 2 characters.

ai.title: Smart Insight
ai.apiKeyMissing: No Gemini API key found. Please add one in settings.
ai.noInsight: No insight available. Try adding more data.
ai.noData: Add some financial data to get a smart insight.
ai.promptForApiKey: Please add your Gemini API key in settings to enable this feature.
ai.generateInsightPrompt: Click here to get an AI-powered analysis of your financial situation.
ai.noDataForInsight: Please add some income or expense data to generate an insight.
